last_episode_to_air.name: The Reckoning
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ten women in the Bahamas sue Peter Nygård and his companies in February 2020. Dozens more join the suit and in December he´s arrested in Canada on US charges.

name: Unseamly: The Investigation of Peter Nygård
original_name: Unseamly: The Investigation of Peter Nygård
overview: An investigation into multiple allegations of sexual assault and sex trafficking brought against the fashion mogul.

episodes.name: Polyester King
episodes.overview: An epic feud erupts between fashion mogul Peter Nygård and his neighbor.

episodes.name: Devil in His Eyes
episodes.overview: Whilst building his multi-million-dollar fashion empire, several women claimed Peter Nygård held them captive and sexually assaulted them.

episodes.name: The Pamper Parties
episodes.overview: Peter Nygård allegedly used his power in the Bahamas to develop and execute a system to lure young, local women and girls to his gated beachfront estate.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: Ten women in the Bahamas sue Peter Nygård and his companies in February 2020. Dozens more join the suit and in December he´s arrested in Canada on US charges.
